title: Short-Selling 101
author: VD
content_html:
See tranny, short tranny.

Diversity is the NFL stadium sponsorship of the 2020s. This could be an entire chapter in CORPORATE CANCER 2.0, which I have absolutely no intention of writing, as it is unnecessary.

DISCUSS ON SG
